cards.name: Bandolier
cards.desc: Need. More. Bullets.

cards.name: Barbarian
cards.desc: Channel your inner Grognak!

cards.name: Basher
cards.desc: Get up close and personal!

cards.name: Bear Arms
cards.desc: Your bear-like arms help you bear bigger arms.

cards.name: Blocker
cards.desc: Brace for impact!

cards.name: Bullet Shield
cards.desc: The best protection is a hail of bullets!

cards.name: Full Charge
cards.desc: Lift your feet!

cards.name: Gladiator
cards.desc: Spartacus, shmartacus!

cards.name: Heavy Gunner
cards.desc: Big guns, big damage!

cards.name: Incisor
cards.desc: Aim for the joints!

cards.name: Iron Fist
cards.desc: Channel your chi to unleash devasting fury!

cards.name: Lock and Load
cards.desc: Maximize the pain on your target!

cards.name: Martial Artist
cards.desc: Light as paper, hard as steel.

cards.name: Ordnance Express
cards.desc: You are an explosive freight train, literally.

cards.name: Pack Rat
cards.desc: You see beauty in the rubbish.

cards.name: Pain Train
cards.desc: Choo choo! All aboard!

cards.name: Scattershot
cards.desc: You were born to shoot buckshot!

cards.name: Shotgunner
cards.desc: Pump action is your kind of action.

cards.name: Slugger
cards.desc: Swing for the fences!

cards.name: Strong Back
cards.desc: What are you, part pack mule?

cards.name: Sturdy Frame
cards.desc: You were built like a brick house.

cards.name: Travelling Pharmacy
cards.desc: You're great at getting boosted... on the go!

cards.name: Archer
cards.desc: A proper release should surprise even the archer.

cards.name: Awareness
cards.desc: To defeat your enemies, know their weaknesses!

cards.name: Bow Before Me
cards.desc: Your arrows always hit where their armor isn't.

cards.name: Butcher's Bounty
cards.desc: You aren't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what you want.

cards.name: Commando
cards.desc: Through hell and back!

cards.name: Concentrated Fire
cards.desc: Stay focused!

cards.name: Crack Shot
cards.desc: You don't have to shoot first, just hit first.

cards.name: Exterminator
cards.desc: Someone call an exterminator?

cards.name: Fire in the Hole
cards.desc: Put it there!

cards.name: Fortune Finder
cards.desc: You're a human metal detector.

cards.name: Glow Sight
cards.desc: The weak spots glow brighter.

cards.name: Green Thumb
cards.desc: Your thumb's gone green from all the radioactive plants!

cards.name: Grenadier
cards.desc: Cool people don't look at explosions.

cards.name: Ground Pounder
cards.desc: The battlefield is your happy place!

cards.name: Long Shot
cards.desc: Keep your distance long and your kill-count high.

cards.name: Night Eyes
cards.desc: Night shift in the Vault honed your eyesight!

cards.name: Night Person
cards.desc: You are a creature of the night!

cards.name: Pannapictagraphist
cards.desc: You can just hear those sweet, sweet zines!

cards.name: Percepti-bobble
cards.desc: Gettin' warm!

cards.name: Picklock
cards.desc: Uncover the secrets of the Wasteland, whether they want you to or not!

cards.name: Refractor
cards.desc: You must be part mirror!

cards.name: Rifleman
cards.desc: Keep your distance long and your kill-count high.

cards.name: Skeet Shooter
cards.desc: Pull!

cards.name: Sniper
cards.desc: It's all about focus.

cards.name: Tank Killer
cards.desc: You are a human can opener.

cards.name: Adamantium Skeleton
cards.desc: Your skeleton has been infused with indestructible metal!

cards.name: All Night Long
cards.desc: One more mile!

cards.name: Aquaboy
cards.desc: Water is your ally.

cards.name: Cannibal
cards.desc: Feast on mortal flesh to heal your wounds!

cards.name: Chem Fiend
cards.desc: Far out!

cards.name: Chem Resistant
cards.desc: All the rush without the hassle!

cards.name: Cola Nut
cards.desc: Zap that thirst!

cards.name: Dromedary
cards.desc: Is that a hump on your back?

cards.name: Fireproof
cards.desc: Ultracite exposure has made you fireproof!

cards.name: Ghoulish
cards.desc: Sure, you're still human - on the outside!

cards.name: Good Doggy
cards.desc: You've learned to live like man's best friend.

cards.name: Hydro Fix
cards.desc: Just a little at a time keeps the thirst away.

cards.name: Homebody
cards.desc: Home is where the heart is.

cards.name: Iron Stomach
cards.desc: Is tonight's dinner Rotting Roadkill Goulash Surprise? No problem!

cards.name: Ironclad
cards.desc: The knights had it right!

cards.name: Lead Belly
cards.desc: Your digestive tract has adjusted to the weirdness of the Wasteland!

cards.name: Lifegiver
cards.desc: You embody wellness!

cards.name: Munchy Resistance
cards.desc: All the hanker without the hunger!

cards.name: Natural Resistance
cards.desc: You're as healthy as a horse! Or deathclaw.

cards.name: Nocturnal Fortitude
cards.desc: Darkness is power!

cards.name: Photosynthetic
cards.desc: Mmmm, that sunlight is delicious.

cards.name: Professional Drinker
cards.desc: Your liver works hard for the money!

cards.name: Rad Resistant
cards.desc: Exposure to the Wasteland had made you more resilient.

cards.name: Radicool
cards.desc: What does not kill you makes you stronger!

cards.name: Rejuvenated
cards.desc: Food for the body and soul.

cards.name: Revenant
cards.desc: Rise from the dead stronger than before!

cards.name: Slow Metabolizer
cards.desc: Your body does more with less!

cards.name: Solar Powered
cards.desc: Catch some rays!

cards.name: Sun Kissed
cards.desc: Fight rays with rays.

cards.name: Thirst Quencher
cards.desc: Your system filters liquids to the EXTREME.

cards.name: Vaccinated
cards.desc: Good thing you're up to date on all 2316 vaccines!

cards.name: Animal Friend
cards.desc: Commune with beasts.

cards.name: Anti-Epidemic
cards.desc: You're a happy doc. Your cures are contagious.

cards.name: Bloodsucker
cards.desc: At least you're an efficient bloodsucker!

cards.name: Bodyguards
cards.desc: Friends are nice - bodyguards are better!

cards.name: E.M.T.
cards.desc: No one dies on your watch!

cards.name: Field Surgeon
cards.desc: The Wasteland is your operating room!

cards.name: Friendly Fire
cards.desc: You majored in aggressive cauterization.

cards.name: Happy Camper
cards.desc: There's no place like home!

cards.name: Happy-Go-Lucky
cards.desc: Everything goes better after a drink.

cards.name: Hard Bargain
cards.desc: You've mastered the art of the deal!

cards.name: Healing Hands
cards.desc: You've got hands of lead.

cards.name: Injector
cards.desc: Up and at 'em!

cards.name: Inspirational
cards.desc: You've got the people skills of a president!

cards.name: Lone Wanderer
cards.desc: Who needs friends, anyway?

cards.name: Magnetic Personality
cards.desc: You are the original social butterfly.

cards.name: Overly Generous
cards.desc: Radiation, the gift that keeps on giving!

cards.name: Party Boy
cards.desc: Nobody has a good time like you!

cards.name: Philanthropist
cards.desc: Share and share alike!

cards.name: Quack Surgeon
cards.desc: That'll wake you up in the mornin'!

cards.name: Rad Sponge
cards.desc: Soak up those rads!

cards.name: Spiritual Healer
cards.desc: Your spirit thrives when helping others.

cards.name: Squad Maneuvers
cards.desc: Squad! Move out! Go go go!

cards.name: Strange in Numbers
cards.desc: Mutants unite!

cards.name: Suppressor
cards.desc: Put the fear of you into them!

cards.name: Team Medic
cards.desc: Don't you die on me!

cards.name: Tenderizer
cards.desc: Make them look like Swiss Cheese!

cards.name: Travel Agent
cards.desc: You've got friends where it counts.

cards.name: Wasteland Whisperer
cards.desc: Master the post-apocalypse!

cards.name: Armorer
cards.desc: Build better armor for your benefit!

cards.name: Batteries Included
cards.desc: You're a power saver!

cards.name: Chemist
cards.desc: You're good with chemicals, periodically.

cards.name: Contractor
cards.desc: Quality over quantity!

cards.name: Demolition Expert
cards.desc: The bigger the boom, the better!

cards.name: First Aid
cards.desc: Is there a doctor in the house?

cards.name: Fix It Good
cards.desc: It's better than new!

cards.name: Gunsmith
cards.desc: You know your guns, inside and out!

cards.name: Hacker
cards.desc: Penetrate terminal security with cutting-edge encryption knowledge.

cards.name: Licensed Plumber
cards.desc: Your Vault job has finally paid off!

cards.name: Makeshift Warrior
cards.desc: All you need is some ingenuity and duct tape.

cards.name: Nerd Rage!
cards.desc: Genius. Is. ANGRY!

cards.name: Pharmacist
cards.desc: Take two of these and never call me again.

cards.name: Portable Power
cards.desc: Introducing the Power Armor Carrying Kit.

cards.name: Power Smith
cards.desc: Achieve world class defense with Power Armor prototypes.

cards.name: Power Patcher
cards.desc: The trick is to keep it oiled.

cards.name: Power User
cards.desc: Dominate the Wasteland with impunity.

cards.name: Robotics Expert
cards.desc: Machines will always serve humans, if you have anything to say about it.

cards.name: Science
cards.desc: Focused mind, focused light.

cards.name: Scrapper
cards.desc: You're well versed in ripping apart junk.

cards.name: Stabilized
cards.desc: Good thing you installed shock absorbers.

cards.name: Weapon Artisan
cards.desc: Weapon repair is an art.

cards.name: Wrecking Ball
cards.desc: You are a literal home wrecker.

cards.name: Action Boy
cards.desc: There's no time to waste!

cards.name: Adrenaline
cards.desc: Living on the edge!

cards.name: Ammosmith
cards.desc: You've become quite the wildcat.

cards.name: Born Survivor
cards.desc: You're a born survivor!

cards.name: Covert Operative
cards.desc: You've read every Covert Operations Manual ever written, twice.

cards.name: Dead Man Sprinting
cards.desc: Burst into the afterlife at a full sprint!

cards.name: Dodgy
cards.desc: Dodge bullets and roll with the punches.

cards.name: Enforcer
cards.desc: No one escapes from you.

cards.name: Escape Artist
cards.desc: You can vanish into any corner.

cards.name: Evasive
cards.desc: Reflexes are better than armor anyway.

cards.name: Goat Legs
cards.desc: You must be double-jointed!

cards.name: Guerilla
cards.desc: You're trained for close quarters shooting.

cards.name: Gun Fu
cards.desc: You've mastered the art of gun fu.

cards.name: Gun Runner
cards.desc: Carry light and run fast.

cards.name: Gunslinger
cards.desc: Channel the spirit of the Old West!

cards.name: Home Defense
cards.desc: Get off my lawn!

cards.name: Light Footed
cards.desc: Don't step here!

cards.name: Marathoner
cards.desc: You're going the distance!

cards.name: Mister Sandman
cards.desc: Murder in the dark!

cards.name: Modern Renegade
cards.desc: Today's skill, yesterday's style!

cards.name: Moving Target
cards.desc: They can't hurt what they can't hit!

cards.name: Ninja
cards.desc: You trained as a shadow warrior.

cards.name: Packin' Light
cards.desc: Packing light doesn't mean packing little!

cards.name: Secret Agent
cards.desc: You're trained for reconnaissance and subterfuge.

cards.name: Sneak
cards.desc: Become whisper, become shadow.

cards.name: Thru-hiker
cards.desc: You have learned the art of proper weight distribution.

cards.name: White Knight
cards.desc: Keep it clean and it lasts longer!

cards.name: Better Criticals
cards.desc: You're a master of striking gold.

cards.name: Bloody Mess
cards.desc: Watch out for flying eyeballs!

cards.name: Can Do!
cards.desc: Yes you can!

cards.name: Cap Collector
cards.desc: You've tapped the Wasteland's hidden wealth.

cards.name: Class Freak
cards.desc: You always were the odd kid.

cards.name: Critical Savvy
cards.desc: You've got a critical eye.

cards.name: Curator
cards.desc: You're a keeper!

cards.name: Dry Nurse
cards.desc: You've mastered the placebo effect!

cards.name: Four Leaf Clover
cards.desc: You've got the luck of the Irish.

cards.name: Good with Salt
cards.desc: You're so salty, it rubs off on your food!

cards.name: Grim Reaper's Sprint
cards.desc: Go for the gold!

cards.name: Junk Shield
cards.desc: Who needs armor when you've got so much junk?

cards.name: Last Laugh
cards.desc: You find humor in death, your own specifically.

cards.name: Luck of the Draw
cards.desc: Make or break, you keep fighting.

cards.name: Lucky Break
cards.desc: If it ain't broke, don't fix it!

cards.name: Mysterious Savior
cards.desc: Victus fortuna iuvat.

cards.name: Mysterious Stranger
cards.desc: Who is he? Why does he help? Who cares!

cards.name: Mystery Meat
cards.desc: The side effects are harmless! Mostly...

cards.name: One Gun Army
cards.desc: You don't need an army. You ARE the army!

cards.name: Pharma Farma
cards.desc: Chems don't grow on trees. Or do they?

cards.name: Psychopath
cards.desc: Kill! Kill! Muahaha!

cards.name: Quick Hands
cards.desc: In combat, there's no time to hesitate.

cards.name: Ricochet
cards.desc: What goes around comes around!

cards.name: Scrounger
cards.desc: Keep the fight going!

cards.name: Serendipity
cards.desc: Fortune favors the bold.

cards.name: Starched Genes
cards.desc: You've kept your DNA prim and proper.

cards.name: Storm Chaser
cards.desc: A little rain is good for the soul.

cards.name: Super Duper
cards.desc: You've always seen double.

cards.name: Tormentor
cards.desc: You like to play with your food.

cards.name: Woodchucker
cards.desc: You can chuck more wood than a woodchuck chucks.

cards.name: Adrenal Reaction
cards.desc: You're at your best when you're on your last legs.

cards.name: Bird Bones
cards.desc: You take falls like a champ.

cards.name: Carnivore
cards.desc: You love a hearty meal.

cards.name: Chameleon
cards.desc: You're a master of blending in.

cards.name: Eagle Eyes
cards.desc: Your eyesight's at an all time high.

cards.name: Egg Head
cards.desc: Your brain's bigger than your brawn.

cards.name: Electrically Charged
cards.desc: You've got an electifying personality.

cards.name: Empath
cards.desc: You're an emotional person.

cards.name: Grounded
cards.desc: You're down to earth.

cards.name: Healing Factor
cards.desc: You're a believer in natural remedies.

cards.name: Herbivore
cards.desc: You love a good salad.

cards.name: Herd Mentality
cards.desc: You work well in groups.

cards.name: Marsupial
cards.desc: You've got a spring in your step.

cards.name: Plague Walker
cards.desc: You're a one-man bioweapon.

cards.name: Scaly Skin
cards.desc: You've got a rough side.

cards.name: Speed Demon
cards.desc: You like to live fast.

cards.name: Talons
cards.desc: You've got a hell of a handshake.

cards.name: Twisted Muscles
cards.desc: You never skip leg day. Or arm day. Or any day, really.

cards.name: Unstable Isotope
cards.desc: You're brimming with energy.
